name: The Reverse of the Summit
description:
You've always been a skillful skier. Do you dare detour into the deep and dangerous caves below?

Mouse to move.

Left click to jump.

Right click to leave unharmed, forever questioning the riches that could have been.

An endless runner cave-skiing spelunking adventure.

This is my entry for the Ludum Dare 48 compo. I have been competing in Ludum Dares since 34, when I was 12. Now I am 18 and about to graduate high school. I am going to college for a game programming degree. Ludum Dare and the community has been extremely helpful to me in growing my passion for game development, and I can't wait to continue in the future. I am glad to participate in this milestone: the 48th Ludum Dare 48 hour compo.

Rate my game here:

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/the-reverse-of-the-summit
